subject: [sugar] ScreenShoots of EduKT
body:
Hi All,Hi.... just for information:  I have post some pictures of EduKT, a multimedia content builder (read: Book Maker, Presentations, etc.) for any OS and OLPC... the release date will be June 1st.... until now some screenshots: 
http://cosperu.com/EduKT/ the project will be hosted on google code and the code repository for OLPC too.The idea is that the "teachers" or content creators will make the books and presentations simply on any OS. I am working on the audio libraries because there is no a same for the 4 OS (Linux/Windows/BSD/OLPC).  However the application is working and meanwhile ill fix some minor bugs.
Thanks,-- --------------------------------Alfonso de la GuardaINVESTIGACION Y CONSULTORIA TECNOLOGICA SACTelef. 97550914           4726906
